game.name: OGORA
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Ogora is a fantasy roguelike deck-builder where you will craft powerful decks, cast unwieldy spells, and blow up your own path through a procedurally generated dungeon. Adorn yourself with hidden trinkets and try your best to survive!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ogora is a fantasy roguelike deck-builder where you will craft powerful decks, cast unwieldy spells, and blow up your own path through a procedurally generated dungeon. Adorn yourself with hidden trinkets and try your best to survive!
